mapper.select: select id,pid,`name`,sort from boot_sys_dept where del_flag = '0' order by sort desc

select distinct boot_sys_dept.id ,boot_sys_dept.pid ,boot_sys_dept.`name` ,boot_sys_dept.sort from boot_sys_dept ,boot_sys_role ,boot_sys_role_dept ,boot_sys_user ,boot_sys_user_role WHERE boot_sys_dept.id = boot_sys_role_dept.dept_id AND boot_sys_role_dept.role_id = boot_sys_role.id AND boot_sys_user.id = boot_sys_user_role.user_id AND boot_sys_role.id = boot_sys_user_role.role_id AND boot_sys_user.id = #{userId} and boot_sys_dept.del_flag = '0' order by boot_sys_dept.sort desc
